objectprepare stringsql_statement
&warn.experimental.func;
Prepares an SQL statement to be executed by the statement-handle PDO::execute method. The SQL statement can contain zero or more parameter markers.
Execute a prepared statement by passing an array of values
<?php /* Execute a prepared statement by passing an array of values */ $sth = $dbh->prepare('SELECT name, colour, calories FROM fruit WHERE calories < ? AND colour = ?'); $sth->execute(array(150, 'red')); ?>
